resources.string: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem ipsum is not simply random text.It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professorr at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, for a Lorem Ipsum passage, source.Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum
